artist: Designer: William Gray Purcell; Designer: George Grant Elmslie
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. George R.A. Johnson, Mr. and Mrs. Nicholas G.A. Johnson, and Mr. and Mrs. Charles R.E. Johnson
description: leaded glass window with linear designs; green, blue, orange and white small colored bars and squares in a frame design around clear glass grid; "crackle" effect clear glass bars around border
markings:
Tag and Stickers

on glass and top of frame: two Christie\'s stickers; on back: red tag
title: Window, from the Decker House
